original_title: お役者変化捕物帖 弁天屋敷
overview: The first work in the series "Cases of An Actor in Disguise" starring Kokichi Takada, based on the original work of Tatsuro Jinde.  Kasumi Ippei is a popular ronin actor, and when he is not on stage he is investigating intricate crimes, in this film Ippei will solve the abduction of seven beautiful young girls.
title: Cases of An Actor in Disguise: Mansion of beauties
